results.content: It was exactly what I wanted.  I took a basic web coding course, and knew that grids were important, so I took this course.  It was the right speed and detail, and the instructor did an excellent job in explaining everything.  I wish she taught more web courses, because I would take all of them!

results.content:
Excellent! Exactly what I needed! This course is concise, thorough, very informative and never tedious. I especially appreciated  the lecturer's use of semantic html elements; using media queries easily; using a mobile-first approach to responsive design; very organized/logical CSS file; short and clear lectures; and six good layout examples (my favorite was the simple nested grid example!). 

This course is exactly what i needed because I hate using Bootstrap (not semantic, excessive HTML clutter aggravates me, and separation-of-concerns issues). I cannot stress enough how much this course has helped me. After completing this course in only 2 days, I can now confidently build complex layouts easily. My key takeaway from this course is that CSS Grid is super flexible and easy to use for building simple or very complex webpage layouts!
